means: 那不勒斯（意大利西南部港市）

sentence.Network_en: He ordered the combined fleet to convoy troops to Naples.
sentence.Network_cn: 他命令联合舰队将军队护送到那不勒斯。

sentence.Network_en: It was the sound of easy laughter in the cafes of Naples.
sentence.Network_cn: 是那不勒斯咖啡馆里那种有点放荡的笑声.

sentence.Network_en: He also claimed the Kingdom of Naples and Sicily.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还声明拥有那不勒斯和西西里王国.
